net.corda.core.node

Class AppServiceHub.DefaultImpls

  • net.corda.core.node.AppServiceHub.DefaultImpls
  • Enclosing interface:
    AppServiceHub

    public static class AppServiceHub.DefaultImpls

    A interface CordaService annotated class requires a constructor taking a single parameter of type interface AppServiceHub. With the interface AppServiceHub parameter a interface CordaService is able to access to privileged operations. In particular such a interface CordaService can initiate and track flows marked with interface StartableByService.

    See Also:
    interface CordaService, interface AppServiceHub, interface AppServiceHub, interface CordaService, interface CordaService, interface StartableByService
